1644750.name: Sheep
1644750.description:
Sheep is a puzzle-solving escapade through crazy mazes starring those most loveable of all creatures... Sheep!

Unbeknownst to everyone, these seemingly dim-witted animals are actually highly intelligent beings from another planet. Over millions of years, the lush green pastures and the Human's lazy nature have caused them to lose sight of their vastly superior status and become the mindless creatures we know today. Lost, alone, and now quite dumb, they need you to reunite them with their celestial ancestors.

  • Choose from the four unlikely heroes: Bo Peep, Adam Halfpint, Motley or Shep, to help herd the sheep through dangerous perils.

  • Control the fate of four different breeds of sheep: Pastoral, Factoral,

  • Longwool, as well as Neo-Genetic, and protect them from Mr. Pear and his evil henchcows!

  • Guide your flock through seven worlds and 28 levels, including amusement parks and disco clubs!

  • Collect all of the golden sheep to gain access to a bonus level in each world!

  • Incredible A.S. (Artificial Stupidity) actually simulates the unique folly of sheep.

  • Mind-challenging puzzles combined with mentally challenged sheep provide hours of enjoyment.
1644750.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 日语
